channel.title: Web views: cross-platform GUIs :: Web Apps in Lisp: Know-how
channel.description: Web views are lightweight and cross-platform. They are nowadays a good solution to ship a GUI program to your users. We present two: WebUI and Webview.h, through CLOG Frame. Info This page appeared first on lisp-journey: three web views for Common Lisp, cross-platform GUIs. WebUI WebUI is a new kid in town. It is in development, it has bugs. You can view it as a wrapper around a browser window (or webview.h).
